Class com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.MimeTypeSettings

com.penthera.virtuososdk.client

Class MimeTypeSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.MimeTypeSettings
  • public class MimeTypeSettings extends java.lang.Object
    MimeTypeSettings is used to store settings for filtering downloads by Mime Type. These types are applied in addition to the default mime types accepted by the SDK.

    Example format: 
         {
     "HLS" : {"VIDEO":["video/someweirdformat]", "AUDIO", "["audio/format"]}
     "DASH" : {"AUDIO" : ["audio/format"],"CC" : "["text/format1", "text/format2"]}
      }
